resources:
DuckDuckGo App for Windows Get early access to try DuckDuckGo for Windows! Windows coming soon! DuckDuckGo for Windows comes with our default privacy protections, including private search, tracker blocking, encryption, and Cookie Consent Pop-up Management. Looking for the Mac Version? Join the Private Waitlist An error happened while joining the Waitlist, please try again later You won\'t need to share any personal information to join the waitlist. You\'ll secure your place in line with a timestamp that exists solely on your device so we can notify you when it\'s your turn. You\'re on the list! We\'ll send you a notification when your copy of DuckDuckGo for Windows is ready for download. Windows waitlist Start testing DuckDuckGo for Windows! Open your invite You\'re invited! Invite Code` Ready to use DuckDuckGo on Windows?\n\nStep 1\nVisit this URL on your Windows device to download:\nduckduckgo.com/windows\n\nStep 2\nOpen DuckDuckGo Installer in Downloads, select Install, then enter your invite code. Ready to use DuckDuckGo on Windows?

Step 1
Visit this URL on your Windows device to download:
https://duckduckgo.com/windows

Step 2
Open DuckDuckGo Installer in Downloads, select Install, then enter your invite code.

Invite Code: %s Invite copied to clipboard Code copied to clipboard Share your invite
